ValidationRule.description: SFDC-18775 Web Message WOC Reason needs to be required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Waiting for customer response"), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Web_Case", NOT(ISPICKVAL(WOC_Reason__c, "Call back")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(WOC_Reason__c, "Contact Verification")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(WOC_Reason__c, "Pending Additional Information")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(WOC_Reason__c, "Resolution Offered")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(WOC_Reason__c, "Serial Verification")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(WOC_Reason__c, "Technical Support Related Questions")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select a WOC Reason to move the Case to Waiting for Customer Response
